title: STAND WITH HONG KONG AT G20 全球報紙集合展

replies.msg:
Freedom HONG KONG
1 hr ·
一群有心香港人於本週為 #FreedomHK 眾籌登報計劃策劃了一獨立展覽，展出 #G20 峰會開始前及期間於全球共十九份報章上刊登的公開信。歡迎大家到場參觀。

Stand with Hong Kong at G20 報章展覽
日期：2019年7月2日至7日
時間：下午一時正至八時正
地址：艺鵠藝術空間（灣仔軒尼詩道365-367號富德樓 6/F）

Happening NOW! A group of Hongkongers have organised an independent exhibition for our #FreedomHK campaign. All 19 copies of the Open Letter published before and during the #G20 Summit in newspapers worldwide are on exhibition this week. Check them out!

Stand with Hong Kong at G20 Newspaper Exhibition
Date: 2-7 July 2019
Time: 13:00-20:00
Venue: ACO Art Space, 6/F, Fu Tak House, 365-367 Hennessy Road

Art and Culture Outreach｜艺鵠
